snippet.title: Perihelion: The prophecy - Amiga Intro Movie
snippet.description:
Intro to Perihelion: The Prophecy for the Amiga home computer.

This was played on Amiga Forever. System emulated was a 2mb Amiga 600.

if you ever want to dive into a very deep Amiga game then I must recommend Perihelion. It is still one of my favourite RPG's and one that I will return to again and again.
